user_query: I'm a student working on a research project about crime patterns. Can you provide me with information about the crime categories for a specific year? Additionally, I'm interested in finding out the last updated date for crime data. Furthermore, I need to search for videos related to crime documentaries on YouTube. Also, I want to search for crimes with no specific location recorded.

TaskList.description: Fetch crime categories for the specified year.
Retrieve the last updated date for crime data.
Search for crime documentary videos on YouTube.
Search for crimes with no specific location recorded.
